name: Ha Long Essence Hotel
address: HD7-35 Đường Hướng Dương,Phuong Bãi Cháy, Hạ Long, Việt Nam
description:
Nằm ở Hạ Long, cách Bãi Cháy chỉ vài bước chân, Ha Long Essence Hotel cung cấp chỗ nghỉ có khu vườn, chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên. Mỗi phòng tại khách sạn 3 sao này đều nhìn ra thành phố, đồng thời khách có thể sử dụng nhà hàng và quầy bar. Chỗ nghỉ cung cấp lễ tân 24/24, dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay, bếp chung và Wi-Fi miễn phí ở toàn bộ chỗ nghỉ.

Tất cả các phòng tại khách sạn được trang bị điều hòa, khu vực ghế ngồi, TV màn hình phẳng có truyền hình vệ tinh, két an toàn, phòng tắm riêng, vòi xịt/chậu rửa vệ sinh, đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí và máy sấy tóc. Tại Ha Long Essence Hotel, các phòng đều đi kèm với ga trải giường và khăn tắm.

Chỗ nghỉ có phục vụ bữa sáng thực đơn buffet, thực đơn à la carte hoặc kiểu lục địa mỗi buổi sáng.

Đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực. Ngoài ra, chỗ nghỉ có dịch vụ thuê xe đạp.

Ha Long Essence Hotel cách Cáp treo Nữ Hoàng 2.1 km và Trung tâm thương mại Vincom Hạ Long 8.8 km. Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Quốc tế Cát Bi, cách khách sạn 43 km.

review.rating: A decent option for the price but overrated from reviews prior to the trip.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: The manager was really friendly and made sure that our stay was comfortable. He even offered us free breakfast which was not included in the booking. The hotel also helped with the booking of a day cruise and kept to the agreed price pre-trip even though the price of the package raised when we were there. There was a seafood restaurant nearby that was delicious and priced fairly.
review.comment_negative: Even though the room interior looks decent, the ratings shown on the site was an over-perception of how great the accommodation really is. Previous reviews rated the place too highly from what it should actually be as we were disappointed by the cleanliness and overall comfort of the stay. The mattress was springy, the bedsheets and pillow cases were slightly stained, there were hairs and some dirt on the floor. The hotel lobby was also very hot with no air conditioning. Moreover, the rooms were not soundproofed at all and a lot of noise can be heard from outside. We stayed during the peak season of holiday for the locals and there were many other local guests in our level, who tend to be extremely loud even during quiet hours at night. This shouldn’t be an excuse for the noise though, as I feel that adequate sound proofing should be a bare minimum for the privacy of guests for a hotel room.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Very welcoming staff who offered impeccable service and went out of their way to ensure a comfortable and pleasant stay. Staff were incredibly friendly, full of smiles and offered tea on arrival and free bottles of water.
They coordinated transport, organised cruise deals and made the whole stay stress free and enjoyable.
Breakfast was generous. Best hot shower I had enjoyed in Vietnam and only 5 minutes drive from the cruise port. Would highly recommend!

review.rating: Nice hotel, spoiled a bit at the end
review.room_type: Suite Essence Với Tầm Nhìn Ra Quang Cảnh Thanh Bình
review.comment_positive:
- it’s a very good three star hotel
- large comfortable beds
- nicely decorated 
- price per night is fair 
- helpful staff in booking taxis and giving area information
review.comment_negative:
- Being on hassled on check out to leave a review, we would have happily done one in our own time and given a 9/10 (as we were happy with our stay) but we weren’t allowed to leave before doing so and then the receptionist told me it couldn’t be a 9 and had to be a 10. They then took a photo of the review and called the hotel owner to check we were allowed to pay and checkout. Hence why we are adjusting this review score down.  Honestly it’s not worth the 10% discount they offer you to leave it, as it has to be a 10. They are now sending us WhatsApp’s which just seems unprofessional, I feel bad for the receptionist as they seem to live in fear of the hotel owner. 
-this isn’t a fault of the property but in low season it’s a ghost town, no where to even get dinner we ended up going to a store and buying instant noodles. We ended up going to a hotel a few roads down and paying to use their pool and facilitates for the day. If you’re staying in the area get somewhere with a pool or at least something to do during the day. Nothing to do at the beach either, no beds,  can’t swim in sea. If you’re doing a cruise go straight there. 
- we had to change the dates of our arrival which we have done at lots of hotels in Vietnam and have never been charged an extra day. Especially as we were the only hotel occupants most of the time. It was hardly preventing anyone else from booking in.

review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn

Suite Essence Với Tầm Nhìn Ra Quang Cảnh Thanh Bình
review.comment_positive: Highly recommend this hotel! the staff will go out of their way to make your stay comfortable and are always available. The hotel manager, Tom assisted with all the arrangements be it from airport pick up, special room requests, ha long bay cruise and drop off to Hanoi everything was taken care of. Can’t emphasise enough what a pleasure it was to stay at this property.

review.comment_positive: The behaviour of staff.Room and washrooms are beautiful.
review.comment_negative: Location.The hotel is pretty far from the main market and has no accessibility of any restaurants e except a couple of them..The hotel also didn’t have any Resturant for food.Only a small option for breakfast was available.No lunch and no dinner.We visited the place in end of October and looked as if there was some curfew on the streets.Deserted area..I would suggest you to stay in Catba island for 3/4 days instead of Halong Bay.You get plenty of direct bus from Hanoi to Catba.Catba is far more beautiful .and the sea views and the colourful nightlife are things to look out for.Halong was deserted and the large building empty streets looks to eat you up.Don’t fall for reviews . For every thing they do they ask us to give 10 review.Right from the time we checked in for every help they are asking for review

review.comment_positive:
The room it’s spacious and comfortable. The hotel  its well located near the beach but far from anything else. Its a very quiet area as most of the things around shut down after the pandemic. Very nice to enjoy the beach alone and rest. You can use taxi and grab to move around, we move a lot to eat specially.
Staff it’s nice and friendly, got great recommendations from them for places to visit and have dinner.
review.comment_negative:
breakfast it’s a bit poor in options and there was not much attention from staff to check that things are re fill or hot. We had to ask for coffee, eggs, milk, butter… etc.
They are aware of this and they just re open after a big hit after covid so it’s understandable.
As I mention before I still recommend this hotel and will be back if I’m around Ha Long again

Wir hatten ein Problem mit der Lampe, was leider nicht repariert werden konnte. Das Hotel hat sich dafür jedoch sehr höflich entschuldigt und mehrmals betont, dass es ihnen Leid tut. Das Hotel ist uns am Ende auch mit dem Preis entgegen gekommen, was ich wirklich sehr nett fand.

review.rating: ハロン湾のクルーズに一拍した後、3泊しました
review.room_type: Suite Essence Với Tầm Nhìn Ra Quang Cảnh Thanh Bình
review.comment_positive:
とてもキレイなホテルです
朝食のフォーが美味しかったです
珈琲はコンデンスミルクを入れて飲みました
ワーケーションで利用したので、昼はずっとホテルに居ましたが、快適に働けました
海までもすぐで、入居してない建物が多くて閑散としているため、ランニングがしやすかったです
静かな場所で、くつろげました
ベットも広くてぐっすり眠れます
目の前にあるレストランが美味しくて、毎日通いました
review.comment_negative:
インターネットがときどき切れるので、Web会議は注意です
カメラオフで、GoogleMeetだとなんとかギリですが、Teamsはよく切れました
周囲になにもなく、最寄りのミニマートはすこし歩きます
ハロン湾は岩が素晴らしい一方、BEACHの透明度が低い（というか濁っている）ため、海の楽しみ方はそれぞれかと
ナイトマーケットは見るべきものはなく、夜遊びがしたい人はすこし遠出する必要があります
廊下に灰皿があり、煙が入ってくるのが気になりました

review.rating: Anständiges Hotel, jedoch in unbel(i)ebter Gegend
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive:
Die Unterkunft liegt etwas außerhalb, aber fußläufig zum Strand. Dort darf man wohl nicht schwimmen, weshalb man davon nicht viel hat. Restaurants gibt es nur wenige, zu den meisten muss man mit dem Taxi fahren oder lange zu Fuß laufen. Insgesamt sauberes Hotel und angenehmer Aufenthalt. Die Mitarbeiter sind sehr darauf bedacht freundlich, zuvorkommend und aufmerksam zu sein. Sie sind sehr bemüht. Leider war die Sprachbarriere bei ein paar Mitarbeitern doch recht groß, Kommunikation lief überwiegend mit Übersetzer oder gar nicht. 

Zu unserer frühen Abreise wurden uns zwei Wasserflaschen mitgegeben. Das fanden wir sehr nett. 

Das Zimmer war nicht besonders groß, aber hatte ausreichend Platz. Das Badezimmer ist durch eine Scheibe mit dem Schlafzimmer verbunden, die Idee fanden wir cool. Wenn das einem nicht gefällt, kann man das Rollo einfach runterziehen. 

Ein Mitarbeiter meldet sich per WhatsApp und bemüht sich einem Wünsche zu erfüllen.
review.comment_negative:
Das Personal ist sehr darauf bedacht, alle Wünsche der Gäste zu erfüllen. Wenn man es in die Tat umsetzen wollte, gab es Missverständnisse und am Ende war man nicht wirklich schlauer.
Außerdem wurde für unseren Geschmack ein wenig zu häufig erwähnt, dass sie sich über eine 9-10 Bewertung bei Booking freuen würden, die wir ohne Aufforderung lieber gegeben hätten. Wir wurden sogar darum gebeten, wenn unsere Bewertung schlechter als 9 ausfällt, gar nicht erst eine Bewertung abzugeben. Das Hotel ist gut! Es muss nicht auf solche Wege zurückgreifen.

review.comment_positive:
- Friendly staff
- They offered us free breakfast as they couldn't manage an early check-in
- If you are looking for a calm place near the beach and if you don't have a problem to walk for 2-3 kms to reach the crowded part of the city, the location can be good. Otherwise, you may find it too far or too quiet. For us it was an ideal location.
review.comment_negative: I can understand that the Halong Bay city has a special situation after covid. So in general, I respect and appreciate all the efforts that the staff of this hotel do to satisfy the clients even if there are some points to improve. However, there is one point that I didn't find fair, which is the fake photo on the Booking.com. We booked a room with sea view and based on the photo on the website, we should have had a good view of the sea. But such a view is not possible as there are blocks of appartments in front of the hotel and even geographically, the sea cannot be as close as it can be seen in the photo. I didn't find this honest.

review.comment_positive: We stayed here for the purpose of doing a boat cruise in Ha Long Bay. The staff were so lovely, and very helpful. The hotel is really pretty and very clean. I notice a few people comment on the location and it’s true that it is away from the main centre, but it’s very peaceful and we found restaurants which were were only a 15 minute walk away - and it’s a really nice walk. Plus, it’s only a quick taxi ride from the main centre. It is only a five minute walk from the beach and we found a great little beach bar nearby. I would definitely stay here again and recommend this lovely hotel if you’re looking for somewhere very peaceful to stay.

review.comment_positive: Clean and the staff were very helpful and friendly
review.comment_negative:
I made an off season reservation for five nights en route to the hotel. When I arrived an hour later, I wanted to reduce my stay to three nights, but I still had to pay for all five nights, even though the hotel was almost empty.
Breakfast was advertised as an extra, but it wasn’t available at all when I stayed (early April).
The hotel is not near to any facilities - any bars and restaurants are a 15 minute walk away and there is nothing to do nearby.  In the off season, it was extremely quiet.

review.rating: We got to HaLong after 10 days of intensive sightseeing and travelling, so we came here to wind down and enjoy our last
review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
review.comment_positive:
Our room was modern and very comfortable, with lots of space to leave 3 big suitcases next to each other. The room also featured high tech air-conditioning (built into the roof, with several exits? so the whole room cools down ). The bathroom was quite spacious and contained a big shower.
The hotel is very close to an absolutely gorgeous beach (3 min on foot), which was pretty empty until 4 or 5 pm. It's a sandy beach with lots of palm trees for shade - the water is not very deep but deep enough to swim. Walking towards the east for a few minutes, you get to a bunch of beach bars with plenty of nightlife (some of them can be very expensive, but most of them are alright) - there even was a (techno) concert? on Friday.
review.comment_negative: Not the fault of the hotel but generally Vietnam: there is lots of trash everywhere (many people just throw stuff they don't need anymore on the ground) and the walls and windows don't really keep out any sounds (hello 8 am karaoke).

review.comment_positive: In a very quite area. We were charmed by  the location. It is in a bit of a Ghost town. We enjoyed strolling the streets with no one around. Looking at all of the new development of a French town complete with giant French statues. The street the hotel is located on, all the  store fronts have a Art Deco 1920s 30s feel, like you are on a movie set . It was certainly  something to experience and for the price we would recommend this hotel. A tip would be for dinner catch a taxi to the part of Halong that the locals eat. Also the Sea Cafe doen the end of the street serves a great coffee.

review.comment_positive: Schön eingerichtetes neues Hotel mit nettem Personal. Gutes Preis-Leistungsverhältniss.
review.comment_negative: Man hatte uns vorher gefragt, ob wir ein kostenloses Upgrade möchten, da sie auf Booking eine bessere Bewertung haben wollen, um nach Corona wieder mehr Besucher zu bekommen. Allerdings haben sie uns im ersten Zimmer kein Upgrade gegeben, obwohl sie meinten es wäre eins und das Zimmer war zudem dreckig. Auf dem Boden lagen Krümel, das Bett hatte Flecken und nach dem Duschen mussten wir feststellen, dass Erbrochenes an der Wand klebte. Sie haben uns anstandslos ein anderes, geräumigeres Zimmer gegeben, allerdings war der erste Eindruck dahin. Zudem war das Personal teils etwas übermotiviert und aufdringlich, wenn sie meinten uns helfen zu wollen. Schlussendlich war das Frühstück nichts besonders und musste extra bezahlt werden.

Das Personal ist äußerst zuvorkommend und hilfsbereit. Mit englisch kamen wir hier sehr gut zurecht und konnten sogar noch eine Nacht spontan verlängern (vermutlich aber nur weil keine Hauptsaison ist).
Die Betten sind sehr bequem und man fühlt sich rundum wohl und aufgehoben!

review.comment_positive:
We only stayed two nights but had a very good time. The staff is professional and very friendly. We were lucky because they gave us an upgraded room without any extra charge when we checked in. All of the staff were very polite and helpful with all our inquiries. Everything was taken care of right away (laundry came back fresh and clean the same day, problems with the safe (our fault) or booking a tour).
The room was clean, modern and looked like the pictures you see online. The bed is comfortable and clean. We had a stable and fast wifi connection, enough hot water and a good breakfast with a variety of options.
The hotel is located in a quiet and safe area and just a few walking minutes away from a beautiful beach. We rented a scooter at the reception and in only about 10-15 Minuten your at the city center. 
It was a great stay and we would love to come back.

review.rating: not what the reviews say, but has what you need. 3/5 is accurate.
review.room_type: Suite Essence Với Tầm Nhìn Ra Quang Cảnh Thanh Bình
review.comment_positive:
****READ ME!!!!**** This hotel asks you for a written review and feedback at the end of your stay, which is totally normal and expected. However, after giving an honest review of about 7/10, they ask to change the score to a 9 or 10! they say due to covid they’re struggling, but honestly, this left a sour taste in my mouth and actually led me to leaving this review - which I wouldn’t have done before. the hotel itself is fine, 3/5 I say is accurate. it’s simple, but has the basics. 

some conditioner and body lotion would be good for the bathroom. there was also a smell that came from the toilet after 2 days. 

now here comes the interesting bit. not sure if it’s a timing thing, but Halong city is DEAD. at the moment. FULL ON GHOST TOWN. My advice would be to come to Halong for a day trip or cruise from Haiphong or Hanoi, but don’t bother with overnight. it was extremely difficult to find food, entertainment, and… people? 

we were here Christmas Eve and ended up going to a swanky commercial hotel as we figured that would be the only reliable place 

the hotel is located next to the beach though which is lovely.

review.rating: Excellent service at a pleasant boutique hotel.
review.room_type: Suite Essence Với Tầm Nhìn Ra Quang Cảnh Thanh Bình
review.comment_positive:
Beautiful boutique hotel on the main street of a newly refurbished area of Ha Long Bay. 

The hotel manager and all the staff were extremely helpful and courteous and made our stay pleasant.  

We asked for advice for a seafood restaurant, and were guided to a most pleasant restaurant with delicious entrees at reasonable prices.  The hotel staff arranged for taxi transport.

We went on a cruise the next day and the hotel staff called our cruise company and made sure that we had all the details necessary. the next morning, after check out, there was a taxi waiting for us and the hotel manager ensured that we arrived with plenty of time for check in for our cruise.

Fantastic service at an amazing price for a beautiful boutique hotel!
review.comment_negative: Nothing to dislike.  everything was perfect.

review.rating: Wenn es rein im das Hotel geht, würden wir sofort wiederkommen! :)
review.room_type: Phòng Superior Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn
review.comment_positive: Das Hotel ist wundervoll! Es sieht sehr hübsch aus, die Einrichtung ist sehr schön und stilvoll. Mir gefällt das Schwarz mit dem Blauton sehr! Die Matratzen sind bequem und keine Panik im Badezimmer: Für ausreichend Privatsphäre sorgt ein Rollo der bei Bedarf heruntergezogen werden kann. :) Zum Frühstück können wir leider nichts sagen, da wir außerhalb gegessen haben, aber es wird auf jeden Fall im Hotel angeboten. Das Personal ist sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit, es gibt kleine Sprachbarrieren aber das Personal hat sofort den Google Sprachübersetzer parat. Damit funktionierte es sehr gut, auch der Herr welcher unser Gepäck bei Abreise in das Taxi geladen hat und uns beim Einsteigen geholfen hat, war super aufmerksam. :) Die Lage ist super um schnell an den Hafen zu gelangen um die Halong Bucht zu besichtigen.
review.comment_negative:
Die Unterkunft ist super, es liegt eher an der Lage. Das ist unsere persönliche Meinung, aber in Vietnam werden teilweise große Areale gebaut, welche nichts mehr mit Vietnam / Asien zu tun haben und das ist nicht das, wonach wir auf unserer Abenteuerreise in VN suchten. Diese Bezirke sollen Italien oder anderen europäischen Städte ähneln und so sind diese auch vom Stil her gebaut. Gerade dieser Distrikt wirkt leer, die meisten Häuser sind leer und unbewohnt, was dem Besucher ein unheimliches Gefühl vermittelt. Ich wünsche den Firmen und dem Hotel, dass sich  - jetzt nach Covid - noch mehr Leben dort ansiedeln wird. Da wir selbst aus Europa sind, wollen wir eher das typische Vietnam sehen. 

Wir haben uns einen Roller gemietet. Das Hotel hat es sehr schnell organisiert und die Roller wurden von einer externen Firma geliefert. Der Mann war leider etwas unhöflich in seiner Ausdrucksweise was uns sehr verschreckt hat. Ich nehme an, dass er schlechte Erfahrungen mit Touristen gemacht hat, aber trotzdem war es unangebracht und nicht so gut für das Image des Hotels. Hier sollte das Personal nochmal Rücksprache halten - abgesehen davon, waren es aber gut funktionierende Roller!

review.comment_negative:
first : we got really disappointed not about the only reason of having nothing near by; mainly because the rate of the hotel is faked by the staff requested the Guest straight away when they arrived to “help them” with the reviews and putting a 10. The property is not a 10, we paid quiet expensive compared to all the place we have been in Vietnam and was the most disappointed place, we even shorted our stayed because it was not what the review were saying. we expect people to be genuine and having a nice vibe, it is what work for long run, not just asking for a rate. I would have been super upset to spend a Honey moon trusted review for booking and realised that it is all faked. Essence Hotel has to understand that people have holidays they work for their money and expect to be in a nice and genuine place for that time they deserved. Not being screw off by fake reviews even the staff is good and the property is fine. 
We understand that everyone has been hurt by Covid pamdemic, and it’s not a reason for making people lie. Ha long is empty for the moment and that is the reality. what we expect from Hotel is giving us clue of what to do, or maybe help to rent a scooter once we arrive to the property… it would have helped a lot and we would have appreciated it.

review.comment_positive:
Freundliches Personal, man kann Touren buchen, haben wir aber nicht über das Hotel gemacht.

Bei Check out sehr zuvorkommend, haben für frühere Abreise Geld zurück bekommen und Wasser für die Fahrt.

Frühstück haben wir nicht getestet.
review.comment_negative:
Zimmer sehr laut, man hat das Gefühl Nachbarn stehen im Zimmer.
Hotel sehr klamm und feucht, im Badezimmer schimmelt es in den Fugen überall.
Matratzen sehr unbequem.

Nachtdienst schläft im Restaurant, wirkt nicht sehr sicher als Aufpasser. (Natürlich weiß ich nicht ob das immer so abläuft)

Um das Hotel ist es wie eine europäische Geisterstadt, man muss Taxi / Grab bestellen um in den belebten Teil von Ha Long zu kommen, ich empfehle direkt auf der linkten Seite Hotel zu buchen (über der Brücke) um das Hotel gibt es keine Restaurants/ Shopps etc.. man kann hier nichts unternehmen, Atmosphäre fanden wir sehr gruselig. 

Am letzten Tag haben wir fast nichts gegessen, da wir nichts finden konnten, was vegetarisch ist. 

Wir sind eine Nacht früher abgereist, eigentlich wollten wir bereits nach Anreise in ein anderes Hotel umziehen, da wir nicht glücklich mit der Wahl waren.

Wir wurden aufgefordert eine gute Bewertung zu schreiben, das kann ich aber nicht mit meinem Gewissen vereinbaren, da ich hier keine Empfehlung aussprechen möchte.

review.room_type: Suite Essence Với Tầm Nhìn Ra Quang Cảnh Thanh Bình
review.comment_positive:
まず受付のスタッフの方の接客の素晴らしさに感動しました。ハロン湾クルーズからの帰りAM11時頃ホテルに寄って荷物を預かっていただくつもりでしたが、1時間後であればアーリーチェックイン可能との事。
荷物を置いて近くの海辺まで散歩し時間を潰しましたが、適度な距離でいい散策が出来たと思います。
もうひとり。20歳程の男性スタッフですが、いつもとびきりの笑顔で接してくれるので、最高の気分で過ごす事ができました。

若干繁華街からは距離があるのが難点と思っていましたが、GRABを呼べば3分程でホテルに到着するし料金も24,000ドン程度…
少しも不便さを感じませんでした。

ハノイまでのリムジンの手配もお願いできましたし、快適に過ごす事ができた3日間でした。
review.comment_negative:

The hotel is located in a hotel area and outside of the season it's a ghost town, most of the buildings are empty, not that many restaurants are open. To stay there one day before a cruise, it's okay, otherwise I rather recommend Cat Ba island, there is more life on streets and bars/restaurants

review.rating: Unhelpful staff that caused me 36 hours of unnecessary anguish.
review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Giường Đôi/2 Giường Đơn Nhìn Ra Thành Phố
review.comment_positive: Whilst the hotel was ok in terms of its facilities, the attitude of the staff completely ruined my stay. To explain, whilst in Ha Long Bay my passport went missing and, as can be imagined, I was distraught (I was scheduled to fly to Hoi An 2 days later). Despite my obvious distress, the hotel staff were only concerned with proving that they had returned the passport to me further to check in - they did not try to help me find the passport. It was only when I arrived at the Meritel Hotel in Hanoi, the day after my stay at the Ha Long Essence, that the reception staff rang the police station in Ha Long Bay and located my passport. The passport had been found in a casino in Ha Long Bay and had been handed in (I had not been in the casino so can only assume that someone was trying to use the passport for financial gain). If it hadn't been for the efforts of the staff at the Meritel Hotel I would not have got my passport back. The Meritel staff arranged for me to confirm my identity via video chat and arranged for a taxi driver to bring the passport to me in Hanoi rather than me having to travel back to Ha Long Bay to collect the passport. If the staff at the Ha Long Essence had been as helpful as the staff at the Meritel, my anguish would have have been for a shorter period of time and I could have collected the passport whilst I was still in Ha Long Bay. Such a shame that the staff let the hotel down.
review.comment_negative: The attitude of the staff.

review.room_type: Phòng Gia đình Deluxe Nhìn ra Thành phố
